form.success_msg_contact: Your message has been sent successfully.

form.success_msg_candidature: Your application has been successfully sent!
form.success_msg_investor: Your request has been sent successfully!

footer.description: Shabaka Invest Group's innovation hub. We turn bold ideas into continental technology leaders.

hero.title:
Building
the Technological Future
of Africa.
hero.description: Deploy cutting-edge solutions through an integrated partnership. We merge our R&D expertise with your ambitions to sustainably transform your competitive advantage.

about_section.title: The entrepreneurial hub that transforms ideas into leaders of tomorrow.
about_section.description: Shabaka InnovLab is the subsidiary dedicated to technological innovation of Shabaka Invest Group. Designed to position Marrakech as a regional center of excellence, our structure acts as an unprecedented catalyst for growth.
about_section.card_desc: We create a strong bridge between startups, institutional investors and the private sector to generate shared value creation (Win-Win).

journey.title: Your Entrepreneurial Journey
journey.description: A clear, sequenced and supported journey from idea to global impact.
journey.step1_desc: Our Dev Studio transforms your concept into a robust and scalable MVP.
journey.step2_desc: Native integration of AI and cybersecurity for complete market trust.
journey.step3_desc: Intensive 3-6 month program to dominate your Go-to-Market.
journey.step4_desc: Proactive legal and tax engineering to protect your growth.
journey.step5_desc: Direct access to Shabaka Invest capital and global network.

startups.title: Accelerate your Growth
startups.description: Transform your potential into leadership. We connect your agility to our network power to multiply your market opportunities.
startups.market_access_desc: Strategic connections with major accounts and key partners.
startups.tech_support_desc: Access to our infrastructures and experts to secure your scale-up.
startups.quote: “We transform promising startups into continental champions.”

why_us.approach_quote: “The success of an idea depends on the absence of resistance to its movement.”
why_us.approach_desc: Our mission is simple: we manage complexity (technical, legal, financial) so that you can focus exclusively on your vision.
why_us.title:
A Community
of Builders
why_us.expertise_desc: Benefit from the lessons learned by our senior founders.
why_us.speed_desc: Go from prototype to market in record time.
why_us.network_desc: A springboard to the continent's strategic markets.

infrastructure.title: The InnovLab Space
infrastructure.description: Access to our infrastructure is designed not as a rental, but as a strategic resource made available exclusively to incubated projects to maximize their productivity.
infrastructure.coworking_desc: Open and modular work areas, designed to encourage exchanges, sharing of skills and spontaneous collaboration between project leaders.
infrastructure.open_space_desc: Work platforms dedicated to project teams in the development phase promoting total immersion in the collective dynamic, without barriers.
infrastructure.meeting_rooms_desc: Spaces equipped with presentation technologies made available to incubates for their strategic work sessions and investor meetings.

sis.title: Shabaka Intelligence Systems (SIS)
sis.description: Shabaka InnovLab owns and manages its own cutting-edge technological structure. Majority-owned by the incubator, SIS is a Simplified Joint Stock Company (SAS) which acts as the group's R&D engine.
sis.sovereignty_desc: Creation of AI solutions adapted to the specificities of the Moroccan and African market.
sis.hardware_desc: Research and development of proprietary hardware and advanced software.
sis.integration_desc: Deployment of AI in key sectors (real estate, energy, health, legal).

solutions.title:
Our Centers of Excellence
Corporate
solutions.description: Robust and modular software infrastructures, ready to be deployed within your existing architectures.
solutions.ai_desc: Generative and predictive AI engines adapted to the specificities of your business sector.
solutions.cyber_desc: Zero-Trust architectures and proactive protection of African strategic data.
solutions.networks_desc: IoT ecosystems and unified APIs for total interoperability of your services.
solutions.tailored_desc: Customized development of critical software building blocks for your businesses.

external_services.title:
Your Partner in
Digital Transformation
external_services.description: Beyond incubation, the strike force of Shabaka InnovLab is at your disposal. Whether you are an SME or a large account, we put our ecosystem of experts at the service of your technological projects.
external_services.dev_studio_desc: Custom development of platforms (Web, Mobile, E-commerce) and software engineering for robust and scalable architectures.
external_services.ai_cyber_desc: Process automation, integration of AI solutions and absolute protection of your strategic data.
external_services.academy_desc: Strategic support (marketing, management), and certified training in new technologies for your teams.

portfolio_section.title: Our Sector Fortresses
portfolio_section.description: Proprietary vertical solutions designed to dominate specific markets.
portfolio_section.media_desc: Digital agility and AI strategic intelligence.

testimonials.title: Echoes of the Ecosystem
testimonials.description: They are building the Africa of tomorrow with Shabaka InnovLab.

contact_page.title: Contact
contact_page.subtitle: Contact our team
contact_page.description: Ready to turn your vision into reality? Our team is at your disposal to discuss your projects and ambitions.
contact_page.form_desc: Complete the form below and we will respond to you as soon as possible.
contact_page.placeholder_message: Detail your project or request here...
contact_page.subject: Subject

candidature.founder_desc: Join the ecosystem and turn your idea into a viable startup.
candidature.investor_desc: Access our qualified deal flow and participate in the growth of African innovation.
candidature.startup_desc: Benefit from our infrastructure and network to scale up.

placeholders.project_description: Describe your idea in a few sentences...
placeholders.investment_thesis: Which sectors or stadiums do you favor?
placeholders.founder_startup_name: Name of your startup or project
placeholders.founder_desc: Describe your vision, target market and value proposition...

candidature.founder_subtitle: Join the ecosystem and turn your idea into a viable startup.
candidature.startup_subtitle: Join a network of strategic partners to scale.

portfolio_page.title: OUR ACHIEVEMENTS
portfolio_page.description: Discover the innovative projects powered by Shabaka InnovLab in various strategic sectors.
portfolio_page.no_results: No projects found for this category.

about_page.hub_desc: Position Marrakech as an essential destination for technological innovation.
about_page.ecosystem_desc: Create a solid bridge between startups, institutional investors and the private sector.
about_page.value_desc: Generate mutual success where the success of startups fuels the growth of the incubator (Win-Win Model).
about_page.modernity_desc: Strengthen the brand image of Shabaka Invest Group as an avant-garde player.
about_page.infrastructure_subtitle: A space designed for excellence and collaboration.
about_page.sis_sovereignty_desc: Creation of AI solutions adapted to the specificities of the Moroccan and African market.
about_page.sis_hardware_desc: Research and development of proprietary hardware (AI servers, sensors) and advanced software.
about_page.sis_integration_desc: Deployment of AI in key sectors (real estate, energy, health, legal).
about_page.partnerships_desc: Shabaka InnovLab relies on a dense network to offer the best to incubates.
about_page.public_institutions_desc: Collaboration with Maroc PME, CRIs and universities for sourcing.
about_page.international_funds_desc: Targeted partnerships with the EBRD, the EIB, the World Bank and USAID.
about_page.private_sector_desc: Sponsorship by banks, telecom operators and multinationals.
about_page.international_dimension_desc: Alliances with European and African incubators (Soft-landing).
about_page.quote_text: “It is not the weight of an idea that determines its success, <br class="hidden md:block"/>but the absence of resistance to its movement."
about_page.incubator_title: The Shabaka Invest Group Technological Innovation Incubator
about_page.invest_group_desc: Shabaka Invest Group is the administrative and legal base that structures the entire ecosystem. A major player in consulting, domiciliation and business strategy in Marrakech, the group ensures the solidity and compliance of the projects it carries out.
about_page.innovlab_desc: Shabaka InnovLab is the subsidiary dedicated to technological innovation. Designed to position Marrakech as a regional center of excellence, it acts as a growth catalyst for project leaders in Morocco and Africa, transforming innovative concepts into viable and efficient businesses.
about_page.vision_goal: Become a key player in the African entrepreneurial ecosystem by supporting technological innovation and the creation of shared value.
about_page.coworking_desc: Open and modular work areas, designed to encourage exchanges, sharing of skills and spontaneous collaboration between project leaders.
about_page.open_space_desc: Work platforms dedicated to project teams in the development phase. These spaces promote fluid communication and total immersion in the collective dynamic, without the barriers of traditional partitioned offices.
about_page.brainstorming_desc: Spaces equipped with presentation technologies made available to incubates for their strategic work sessions, their steering committees and their meetings with investors or partners.
about_page.sis_desc: Shabaka InnovLab owns and manages its own cutting-edge technological structure. Majority-owned by the incubator, SIS is a Simplified Joint Stock Company (SAS) which acts as the group's R&D engine.

services_page.selection_desc: Identification of projects with high scalability potential.
services_page.resources_desc: Free provision of infrastructure (offices, HD internet, technical tools).
services_page.mentoring_desc: Personalized monitoring by sector experts (Legal, Finance, Tech) from the Shabaka Invest Group network.
services_page.platform_desc: Custom development of web, mobile applications and showcase or e-commerce sites.
services_page.engineering_desc: Creation of robust and scalable architectures.
services_page.maintenance_desc: Continuous technical management of deployed products.
services_page.ai_deploy_desc: Integrating artificial intelligence solutions to optimize business processes and configuring automations to reduce time-consuming tasks.
services_page.cybersecurity_desc: Consulting, auditing, data protection and securing digital infrastructures.
services_page.marketing_desc: Brand strategy, branding, digital marketing and visibility management to accelerate market penetration.
services_page.intensive_desc: Acceleration cycles of 3 to 6 months to boost “Go-to-Market”.
services_page.fundraising_desc: Active support in the search for external financing (Business Angels, VC).
services_page.consulting_desc: Support in strategy, tax management and business law (the DNA of Shabaka Invest).
services_page.workshops_desc: Certification training in new technologies, Investor Pitch and Management.
services_page.main_intro: Shabaka InnovLab's offering is structured around five fundamental pillars to secure the entrepreneur's journey and offer high-level technological services.
services_page.dev_pole_desc: InnovLab has a complete development center acting both as technical support for incubated startups and as a digital agency for external clients.

404.title: Oops ! Page Not Found
404.description: It seems you have reached the limits of our digital galaxy.
404.lost_desc: Don't leave empty-handed. Discover our innovative projects and technological solutions.
404.help_desc: An urgent question? Our team is immediately available on WhatsApp to guide you.
404.gift_desc: Take advantage of a free 30-minute consultation to discuss your digital strategy.

500.title: Internal Error (500)
500.description1: An unexpected error has occurred on our servers.
500.description2: We have been notified and are working to resolve the issue.
